Docs.summary: Specifies drill-down and node viewing mode for an <xref:system.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner>, such as Flowcharts, that are used to compose activities.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Drilling down into the UI elements is allowed by default. It can be disallowed by setting the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute.AllowDrillIn%2A> property to `false`. Child nodes are not always collapsed by default, but can be set to always collapse by setting the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesignerOptionsAttribute.AlwaysCollapseChildren%2A> property to `true`.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether drilling down one level into an <xref:system.Activities.Presentation.ActivityDesigner> is allowed.
Docs.value: `true` if drilling into the UI elements is allowed; otherwise, `false`. The default value is `true`.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the child nodes are always collapsed.
Docs.value: `true` if the child nodes are always collapsed; otherwise, `false`. The default value is `false`.
